channel.title: General on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in General on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Enable / Disable Supplier
Enable / Disable Brands
Enable / disable SSL
item.description: Preconditions Besoin d’une shop en ligne. Steps enable ssl et voir si votre shop est accessible en https

item.title: Display brands / best sellers
item.description: Steps Display brand and suppliers enabled Go to FO, Sitemap : There should be the brands and suppliers listed Disabled both options, go to FO, Sitemap : Brands and suppliers are not listed, and are not accessible by URL

item.title: Round mode
item.description: Steps Try different round mode with different decimals, and with for example, the steps in this PR : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/issues/18640

item.title: Allow iframes
item.description: Steps Disable this option Go to a product, in description field change the Source Code and add an iframe (for example : \ \ ) \ Save : It should not work. \ \ Enable the option, try to add the iframe again : It should work. On the FO page of the product, you should see the youtube video.
